item.title: Silver Spike Investment Corp 10-K
item.description: Silver Spike Investment Corp, which is in the Missing_from_sec_filing_header [None] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 29, 2022 had 43843 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
